sentences.en: A barren hen is always jealous!
sentences.cn: 她是阉过的母鸡,看见别人的孵卵是难受的.

sentences.en: A few years back you could see nothing but barren land there.
sentences.cn: 数年前人们在那儿所能看到的只是荒野.

sentences.en: As the leaves of autumn wither and fall, so has my own life become barren.
sentences.cn: 我的生命就如秋叶般枯萎凋零。

sentences.en: He also wants to use the water to irrigate barren desert land.
sentences.cn: 他也想用这些水灌溉荒漠。

sentences.en: He prayed that his barren wife would one day have a child.
sentences.cn: 他祈祷自己不孕的妻子有朝一日能怀上宝宝。

sentences.en: Once again Hearn realized how barren the General's tent was.
sentences.cn: 将军的帐篷太空落落了!侯恩又一次产生了这样的感触.

sentences.en: She found a small, inexpensive motel on the outskirts of the town; it was barren and unlovely.
sentences.cn: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。
她是个不能生育的妇女.

sentences.en: That's probably the most bare, bleak, barren and inhospitable island I've ever seen.
sentences.cn: 那可能是我见过的最荒凉的岛屿，荒无人烟，寸草不生。

sentences.en: The barren land could produce little food.
sentences.cn: 那贫瘠的土地几乎不长庄稼.

sentences.en: The formerly [ once ] barren land has been changed into stretches of fertile fields.
sentences.cn: 昔日的荒地今天成了良田.

sentences.en: The land is barren on the east coast.
The place used to be a stretch of barren land.
sentences.cn: 早先这里是一片不毛之地.
这是一场毫无结果的争论.

sentences.en: Thousands of years ago the surface was barren desert.
sentences.cn: 很久很久以前，地面还是一片荒漠。

sentences.en: Within a few years they had transferred barren wastes into fertile fields.
sentences.cn: 几年之内他们就把荒地变成了良田.

phrases.tran_cn: 贫瘠的荒野；无油气地区
无油气的岩层；空白岩石；无矿岩；废石

trans.tran_cn: 荒芜的，无用的，空的，不育的
trans.tran_en: (of land or soil) not good enough for plants to grow on it
